definition: to make a choice (between several alternatives)/a choice/an option/an alternative
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: Prepay and Post Pay option for each dial plan.
sentences.chinese: 预付款和后付款选项为每个拨号计划。

sentences.english: If you give an option of failure deep within yourself, you will fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你内心深处给了自己失败的选项，你将会失败。

sentences.english: But that doctor may also use value-laden language to describe the options.
sentences.chinese: 但是医生也会使用具有价值取向的语言描述这些选项。

sentences.english: It provides an optional zoom window for precise shots.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了一个便于精确抓图的缩放选项窗口。

sentences.english: Fixed not being able to escape from map editor menus after applying options.
sentences.chinese: 固定不能够逃脱地图编辑器菜单后应用选项。

sentences.english: Neither do you want to enable these options, I guess.
sentences.chinese: 我猜，你也不想要以下这些选项吧。

sentences.english: When I click another tab, the content literally glides to it.
sentences.chinese: 当我单击另一个选项卡时，内容便逐字地向其滑动。

sentences.english: You should choose the second option, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是您应该选择第二个选项。

sentences.english: If the server hasn't been started, this option will be grayed out.
sentences.chinese: 如果该服务器尚未启动，该此选项将显示为灰色。

sentences.english: The main option I focus on in this article is the inline editor switch.
sentences.chinese: 本文将重点讲述的主要选项是行内编辑器开关。

sentences.english: Added an option to turn off smoke and dust off the tank tracks.
sentences.chinese: 增加了可以关闭坦克行驶时的烟雾和扬尘的选项。

sentences.english: If you desire full redundancy, order option 002.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要完全冗余，则订购选项002。

sentences.english: The only option left with me was to ask her to go the airport for getting her ticket re-scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 留给我的唯一选项就是叫她去机场重新预订机票。

sentences.english: If you do not specify anything for this option, all records are eligible for extraction.
sentences.chinese: 如果该选项未指定内容，则提取所有记录。

sentences.english: You have a few options for editing the button style.
sentences.chinese: 在编辑按钮样式时，有几个选项供您选择。

sentences.english: A third option lets you cancel the jump.
sentences.chinese: 第三个选项允许您取消跳转。

definition: blank/blank space on a form/space/囗 (indicating missing or illegible character)
the subject under discussion/the point at issue
